website_summaries.verdict: One of the more powerful and feature-rich portable speakers you'll find, but it's expensive.
pros: Supports up to 20 hours of battery life from a single charge
Speakers are available in multiple colors for some fun options
Waterproof speaker that works in any kind of environment
Allows you to connect up to 3 devices at one time over Bluetooth, meaning you can switch back and forth between different audio streams
cons: More expensive than other portable speakers
Audio quality suffers noticeably at max volume

customer_reviews.title: JBL no more!
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker. But it quit working after 6 months. I thought the battery might have lost it’s charge. But it will not work even with direct power.
customer_reviews.author: JCStar

customer_reviews.title: App requires GPS location tracking just to run.  No thank you!
customer_reviews.text: I though JBL was a music company, not a data mining company. The app requires your location just to run! That means no updating firmware or adjusting sound controls. JBL should be in the music business, not in the business of mining and selling your personal information to third parties. Sorry, but going back to UE. Their app is awesome and doesn't require tracking my physical location to listen to good music.
customer_reviews.author: oregonrunningguy

customer_reviews.title: Purchased in october of 2017 and unfortunately it has stopped ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in october of 2017 and unfortunately it has stopped working. For this type of money. That's not right.
customer_reviews.author: Derek J. Schmit

customer_reviews.title: Wont charge
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in June and now it won't hold a charge and keeps shutting off. Updates have been done but still doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: This little speaker has great sound and lasts for a long time
customer_reviews.text: Update 09/10/2017: I absolutely loved this speaker when I received it (see original review below, purchased in May 2017). However, I have taken it on a few camping trips and it has begun to disconnect from any device I have streaming - my cell, a friends cell, an iPad, an iPod.. it doesn't matter what it is. It will randomly stop playing, but will still be connected via Bluetooth. Sometimes it will not restart and we have to switch devices. Such a sad thing when it was so glorious to begin with! I don't think I'll be purchasing from JBl anymore. :( Original post: Definitely exceeded my expectations! This little speaker has great sound and lasts for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.text: Update: The flip3 sounds better than my charge3 that i bought at the same time to pair together, its so much clearer than the Charge3...which has more overall bass but the whole sound of the Charge3 is muddled compared to the clear Flip 3. BUT....together they sound great! PREVIOUS: Charge 3 sounds pretty good by its self, but I paired it w a flip 3 and together they sound unbelievable. I think I may like the flip better than the Charge but time will tell. I like how I can carry the flip easily in my hand because its not near as thick as the Charge. Paired together they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Jo Markham

customer_reviews.title: Buyer BeWare ~ We received a counterfeit in 2017
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in 2017 and in 2019 our JBL Charge3 micro USB port to charge the speaker stopped working. We decided to try to fix it this month and when ordering a new micro USB charge port the parts store asked us to provide the FCC ID number from the speaker. On genuine JBL CHARGE 3 products the FCC ID number starts with JBL or API. Well guess what? Ours has no numbering anywhere. The invoice states it is a Charge3 but Nope! The inside has no identifying numbers at all. Shock of all shock we received a countfeit. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: R.C.

customer_reviews.title: Muddy Sound Can't Hear Voices Clearly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to improve sound quality when watching movies and listening to audio on my laptop. One YouTube review mentioned the treble not being super clear, but that was an understatement. The Charge 3 might be good for thumping music, but it is Terrible if you want to hear voices clearly. I returned it and got a JBL Flip 4, which is soooo much better at voices.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Speaker blown after 1 yr of mild use
customer_reviews.text: I have had this unit for a little over a year now. It sounded very good til recently. I did not use this speaker often, only when I would work on a project is my shed occasionally. It also never had been in rain or water of any kind. However, when I did use it, I would play it on full volume. The speakers were blown just after the warranty period was over. (12 months) I would not buy again or reccomend unless you plan on not using this on full volume.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Both speakers damaged after 3 months of very light use.
customer_reviews.text: Well, i was very happy with it, until it broke. I gave it a very light and careful use, only at home and from time to time, but seems that the inner speakers are damaged, it have no sound quality and the bass are completly off. There is not official service in my country for JBL, so i have any way to fix it, no warranty in my country. Very dissapointed with JBL, i thought there are hi quality products with worldwide support. I won't buy or recommend any JBL product to anybody. Very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastián Zahn

customer_reviews.title: The JBL Charge 3 has a nice balanced sound to it
customer_reviews.text: The JBL Charge 3 has a nice balanced sound to it. I cannot attest to whether the waterproofing works but it does give me some peace of mind that it *should* if an accident were to arise or when we use it by the pool. It seems to charge quickly and the built-in power bank is in good working order. It's a great size and can get pretty loud! I've paired it to iPhones, iPads, and Android phones without any issues. My only gripe is how easily the power button can get pressed and that it didn't come with a hard case because of that.
customer_reviews.author: KCWTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Stereo in Connect mode is a really nice feature.
customer_reviews.text: With speaker bars and portable Bluetooth, it's been AGES since I've listened to anything in true stereo mode. I purchased 2 of the Charge 3s that come with regular Connect. I understand that you can "upgrade" to connect +, but I've read horrible things about speaker mode with Connect+. Anyway, I've only had them for a day, but am totally blown away by the sound and the stereo capabilities. I don't believe I will need more than 2 connected speakers, so the Connect and JBL app works for me, but if I ever DO think I need more, I can download the firmware to make that possible. Thanks, JBL. You make a fine product.
customer_reviews.author: kareterra

customer_reviews.title: Great but another gem is even better
customer_reviews.text: The speaker is very good quality, has a full balanced sound and is definitely a great value for the money. The only reason i gave it 4 stars is because I compared it to Denon dsb-250 and as nice as it is it pales in comparison to the Denon, sounds a little too bright with the Denon having surprisingly deeper bass and more balance sound overall, easier on ears also. I bought the Denon on Amazon.de from Germany. They shipped over to the US by dhl in just two days.
customer_reviews.author: Val P

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Sounds like a muffled toy, drops the connection, and just forget about updating it. Maybe I got a fake but I've had sound and connection issues with this thing since day one. Did the update via the app, said everything was good, went to connect and it wouldn't. Turned off bluetooth, turned it back on, still nothing. Turned off the speaker and it wouldn't turn back on. Returning and getting something of better quality and sound.
customer_reviews.author: TechExpert

customer_reviews.title: Not good for audio books or podcasts. Static is bad at low level.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good sound when played loud. When listening to audio books and podcasts, there is a terrible static. I would not recommend this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME sound from a very portable speaker!!!!!!  Will be buying another for linking!
customer_reviews.text: Tested a handful of speakers out at my local Target. This speaker, by far, blew the other speakers away (Bose, Beats and other JBLs). Purchased it on Amazon b/c the price was $20 cheaper. I love this speaker. I will soon be purchasing another since they can be paired to perform in stereo with each other. Love the waterproof nature b/c I love listening to music in the shower. I don't have to worry about the humidity damaging it. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KeziaPurrsTop Contributor: Violins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound in a Relarively Small Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned a Bose Soundlink Mini for a couple years and really like the ultra-portable, Bluetooth concept and love the speaker. I use it daily. Wanting a full-time model by my TV chair, I did the research and the JBL Charge 3 kept making the top part of most lists. Since it was selling for on $99, decided to give it a try. Simply, it puts out a relatively big and clean sound, and is a great deal for the price. Ended up buying two for myself and two more for friends. ***RECOMMENDED***
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, then Bluetooth failed. No help from support
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this speaker almost 1 year ago. It worked great for several months, but it began skipping with my iPhone connected. The skipping made it unusable. This lasted even after resetting the speaker, forgetting the device on the iPhone, and updating iOS. When replacing my iPhone with a newer version, the problems persisted. It will play for about 5 minutes, then start to skip several times a second, making it completely un-listenable. Neither iPhones have issues connecting to any other Bluetooth devices. I contacted customer support about this, figuring it was still under warranty, and they simply said since this only happens with my iPhones, I should contact Apple.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Was looking for a waterproof/splash-proof speaker with some great sound. Even though I have only had it ...
customer_reviews.text: After doing a ton of research, reading reviews and asking around I decided to pull the plug on this speaker. Was looking for a waterproof/splash-proof speaker with some great sound. Even though I have only had it for a couple days we had played it non-stop. The sound is much better than I anticipated. I will have to come back and review on the battery life once we give it a run for it’s mney. I do like the ability to charge your phone while playing because my iPhone 6s dies fast 🙄 Connectability was quick and painless. I did purchase separately (from another vendor) the silicone sleeve carrier that protects buttons. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: You'll only get decent sound if you make some alterations
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid build construction, battery life is great, but out of the box the sound is muffled. To make it better I had to use an equalizer and remove the grill which probably voided the manufacturer warranty. One nice feature is you can pair two of these speakers and play them in stereo mode, the only annoying thing is you have to pair them together every time you turn them on because apparently the setting doesn't get saved.
customer_reviews.author: randir14

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as advertised, don't hesitate to buy this speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as advertised. I use it as my desktop speaker for my PC and it works AWESOME with the bluetooth. I rarely charge it and it sounds truly impressive (from an audiophiles perspective). If you can place it in a creative spot against a wall or in a drawer, it will drive some serious air for low-end reproduction. The mids and highs are not to do for, but seriously impressive for this cost. Don't hesitate to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Phil C

customer_reviews.title: JBL Charge 3 is perfect in every way!
customer_reviews.text: I was considering a UE Megaboom 3 but seen complaints of battery only lasting 3 hours if you play loud. Well that battery is only 3000 mah battery. The Charge 3 has a 6000mah battery. I compared the sound of the two at Best Buy previously and honestly couldn't tell the difference. I considered the Charge 4 but from the reviews was only getting a larger battery and usb-c charging cord. Plus you lose the speaker phone and also assistant (google and siri) function so I opted for the Charge 3 for $100 less and very happy with the choice.
customer_reviews.author: pnovak

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Good sound. No problem with losing bluetooth connection so far, after only two days, but we'll see down the line. Experience with previous speaker of different brand was dismal in that regard. Only complaint is the set-up manual is completely worthless, containing no written instructions but only symbols & icons. Have we come to that? In compensation, customer service via telephone was prompt and efficient, walked me through it in half a minute. Also power cord is short -- and freakin' orange!
customer_reviews.author: C. Strock

customer_reviews.title: He has the camo- which is a really nice color. My only regret is I should've bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and hubby loves this speaker! He had the last version and dropped it one too many times. Bought the bullet and bought him this for Christmas and the sound was definitely a step up from the previous version. Expensive, but worth every penny. He has the camo- which is a really nice color. My only regret is I should've bought him the red speaker so it's easier to spot in his shop.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: Durable and good battery life
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to listen to music/sports radio at work. Volume is not an issue. I can hear it just fine with ear plugs in and a rumbling diesel vehicle. Sound wise it's pretty good. This thing has a lot of bass (something small speakers usually don't have). I have noticed though that some types of music sound worse when played thru it because of the added bass. Could be the mixing of some albums, but classic rock and classical dont sound the best thru this thing. Jazz, Hip hop, Drum and Bass, and some metal music do sound great though. Battery life is good, and it seems durable in the harsh environment I work in. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jarex

customer_reviews.title: Best sound quality in its size class
customer_reviews.text: I have been comparing portable bluetooth speakers in this general size range at the displays in big-box stores for the past year, and concluded that the JBL Charge 3 was the best sound in its size class and reasonable in price. So, I ordered it, and it didn't disappoint. Sound quality is terrific for a speaker this size. It is extremely easy to pair and, once paired, seems to automatically switch between devices seamlessly - a pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: James A.

customer_reviews.title: BEST SPEAKER EVER
customer_reviews.text: Did a ton of research for portable blue tooth speakers. I needed a good one for my wedding as we elected to not have a DJ (short small wedding). I didn't want to break the bank on a speaker but also didn't want to invest in a low quality speaker. This speaker blew me away. The quality of sound for this little thing is AMAZING! Even at high volume the sound quality is fantastic. Can't beat the price either! I would HIGHLY recommend this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wood

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound quality and great battery life.
customer_reviews.text: My niece had one of these and having been impressed by it I decided to get one. Sound quality is simply fantastic and battery life is very good as I have been using this now for over a week pretty regularly and have not given it a charge. I have not had this one out to the lake yet but what really impressed me was that my niece had knocked hers off the back swim deck of the boat into the water my initial thoughts were "oh crap that's a goner" but it was plucked out of the water and this thing didn't miss a beat.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware of hidden monthly cost to adjust sound balance.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like all these “portable” speakers have the same problem: the sound isn’t clear and crisp, and needs to be balanced. Little did I know until I purchased, that I can access a program to recalibrate the sound quality, BUT, have to pay a monthly fee for the privilege of keeping the sound quality (balance) I prefer. I found that outrageous. But it’s too late to return the speaker. Caveat emptor!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Easily the best Bluetooth speaker without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing speaker. It's very loud without sacrificing quality. Nthe build quality is top notch. I've dropped this a few times already and there isn'ta single scratch or dent. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because I only get about 8 hours on a charge not the 20 advertised. Still worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Sean stowers

customer_reviews.title: Durable and the sound quality is great
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this review after more than two years of usage. First I have to say that JBL still works well for all the types of music, especially for subwoofer-like ones. It is easy to connect via Bluetooth, which is stable without interruption. In addition, it is easy to carry, I used it in my dorm room, took it while camping, and now it's in my new 1B1B apartment. After 2 years of using, I still love it for its durability and sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alice5566

customer_reviews.title: Quit after 2 months, DO NOT buy!
customer_reviews.text: Just past the return and support windows this unit quit working. It sounded great until then, but is obviously a terrible value for only 2 months of service.
customer_reviews.author: James M Lee

customer_reviews.title: Bose soundlink II vs JBL charge 3
customer_reviews.text: I have a Bose Soundlink II, and needed an additional speaker, figured I would try the JBL. Sound= Bose is cleaner and sharper, JBL has more base, winner Bose Build Quality= both excellent, I bought the gray JBL, kinda looks retro, personal preference I like the looks better of the JBL. Touch/feel= Bose has a soft rubber feel, JBL has waterproof cloth Battery= Bose is good, JBL is better Bottom line to me if you want real clean sound, go with the Bose. If you looking for something to be used at a party, the JBL can crank up the sound, with big base.
customer_reviews.author: Mark2009

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay...
customer_reviews.text: For the size of this speaker, I expected a more robust sound but I have tried other brands and maybe this is the best it gets. I've bought and been satisfied with JBL brand products in the past, based on that this should have longevity and withstand minimal wear and tear. The battery is okay, I use the speaker often throughout the week and will need to charge once a week. I had issues with the initial connection of devices but once connected it's seamless. Keep in mind, for me when connecting new devices is a pain, multiple restarts, turning Bluetooth on and off, headache. It shouldn't be that painful.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth Speaker For The Money
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this speaker is great. Battery life, connectivity range, sound quality, EVERYTHING. Worth every penny. I’m not sure on the exact battery life, but I’ve used it for 5+ hours at the beach two weekends in a row without a charge and it’s still got battery left. The higher the volume, the faster the drain, so a lot of that is up to the user. Sound quality is what you’d expect out of a JBL, a nice midrange with a good deal of bass. I don’t have any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D

customer_reviews.title: Get the Charge 4 instead! -Best $120 bluetooth speaker available Summer 2020
customer_reviews.text: Just get the Charge 4. After having both pairs (of the C3 and C4 and since they are a mere $20 difference in price now, the winner is the newer 4. Especially if you are looking for a stereo pair the Charge 4 pairs to bluetooth MUCH better. The larger bass radiators are better sounding. The USB-C ports are easier to use (bidirectional) and there is a light on top when paired so you don’t trip over them by the pool when it gets dark! The grey is also a darker graphite color and less prone to staining and dirt. All these minor changes make the newer model superior.
customer_reviews.author: A. Design

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!  Can be submerged!  No worries!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a few years now and it’s fantastic! Perfect for the beach, at the pool or hot tub. No worries about it getting wet at all! Very good sound and being able to link three together is very cool. I’ve used it to charge a phone too and that is very cool. Really good battery like and has held up great. I also got the silicone cover and carrying case to help keep it in good shape, long-term. I ended up buying 3 more as gifts for the kids and they all still use theirs whenever they head to the beach/lake or just hanging with friends or in their rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Esteeayceewhy

customer_reviews.title: I have an old car
customer_reviews.text: I have an old car so I need a speaker for music and audiobooks. This speaker is the best on the marker. I have one previously and it lasted ten years. The only reason I had to replace it is because I left it in the car during the summer with temperatures of 110 to 120 degrees for five or six days. It melted some of the wiring. The sound quality of this one is excellent. The battery life is great. It charges when I have the car running. Any other time the battery will last eight or ten hours between charging. A great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cartec

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !!! I fell in love with this!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing BT speaker and I recommend to everyone. I searched 3 vs 4 and glad I got 3! Better sounds and best base. I can connect to laptop ( without using BT) option is very nice. I never worry about battery... very compact, I some times use this speaker over my BoseS1 for my virtual Zumba class! ( Yes, this speaker is almost Raquel great sound to Bose s1 over the internet. My students asked me what speaker I used because it was clear and great sounds and this is it! I don’t think I can find any other compact BT speaker like this.
customer_reviews.author: Kona82

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: Use this speaker with our projector. Connects quickly to phones and the Bluetooth dongle for the projector. Sound is good and gets pretty loud. Highs pitches might be a little muffled by the bass but doesn’t matter a ton. It is heavier then I expected but the overall size is good. Only have charged it once so far but have gotten 8 ish hours of play time on the current charge.
customer_reviews.author: Luigi Vampa

customer_reviews.title: Great product recommend charge 3 over jbls charge 4 or even flip 5
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is great. loud but clear. I've compared it to a few different speakers. The biggest difference between this and most is when the volume is even all the way up you don't loose sound quality or get muffling. battery life's is around 12 hours and even works as a portable charger. If your looking at the charge 3 vs the charge 4 buy the charge 3. I've seen and heard both and the quality gap is way to small to make sense of spending the extra money on the charge 4. My only other recommendations is buy a case for the speaker it durable but with exposed woofers on the side I worry about Puncturing one during transport.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Beall

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend, JBL customer for life!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker has it all. The sound quality is amazing, the volume output is more than substantial, and the added benefit of being waterproof and floating is quite impressive. I've owned this item for over a year now, and haven't had one issue with it. Never an issue with bluetooth connectivity, or any wear and tear on the item at all. It charges incredibly fast, which is a real plus. I use it on the lake every weekend during the summer and it's never failed me. Everyone who see's it is so impressed with its sound quality and waterproof ability. JBL if by far a superior brand, and I will be a repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas A Mathias

customer_reviews.title: Top class sound quality. I have a new found respect for jbl.
customer_reviews.text: This speaker sounds amazing for it’s size. I keep picking it up in disbelief while it is playing. It connected instantly to my iPhone and thus I could play whatever song through Spotify that I wanted immediately out of the box. Not to mention Spotify’s equalizer is a perfect way to tweak the sound of the speaker. I’ve heard a lot of Bluetooth speakers, and I’m glad I got this one. It’s loud enough that I wouldn’t put it at top volume in my apartment late at night and it easily fills a room with great quality sound. It’s waterproof And it floats...how perfect. I’m going to take this thing everywhere (especially the shower).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect speaker for... anything? and everything
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy build, solid material, not crappy or cheap like most off-brand electronics (you get what you pay for folks). Connectivity is extremely simple, fast, and just works. Weight is good, this little speaker has a nice sound and quite powerful bass, and can perch itself anywhere. In your room decorating? This speaker is what you want. Having a romantic dinner in? This speaker is what you want. Having friends over for a big party by the pool or outside or inside? This speaker is what you want. This is speaker is what you want. This speaker is what you want.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: If you hear one you'll buy one, aka no regrets
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal sound, wish I'd found this earlier instead of spending nearly the same trying different and cheaper models. This is the only Bluetooth speaker I've heard that really carries the emotion of the music through. I found this one because someone brought one on a vacation and I was impressed with the bass. I just got back from another vacation and someone else is buying one because they were impressed with the bass. If you hear it you'll buy it. The next step up in sound quality is a full on sound bar. Also works great for music in a loud old car with no other alternatives to AM/FM radio. Sounds better than the stock speakers anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working and I have only had it 10 months
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for less than 10 months, and it no longer works. I tried calling the 888 number for customer service and I get a weird recording. It actually started flaking out a few months ago but was working intermittently. Now it doesn't work at all. It looks like it has charged, but when I go to use it, it will not work. I want to talk to someone about it, but I can't get in touch with anyone! This is very frustrating! I think a product should last longer than a few months. This is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Best speaker Choice I've ever made do not settle for imposters.
customer_reviews.text: Best Bluetooth speaker I've ever owned. Sound quality is impeccable we've had it for almost a year now still love it just as much. It's also waterproof so no worries having it by the pool I've knocked it in about eight times. Lol also really cool thing if you hold down the Bluetooth button and the volume down button together for about 10 seconds it turns it into bass boost mode, amazing. Perfect for watching movies comma by the pool, or out on a bike ride which I do a lot. Also awesome part of it you can have three of them and pair them together and they all playoff one source. Don't settle for less well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Stealey

customer_reviews.title: Mid range sound lacking.
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the other reviewers who mentioned the lack of mid range. The speaker is nice but totally lacks mid range. Vocals and instruments get totally washed out. I was also surprised the iOS app doesn’t have an equalizer to help combat this. The exposed radiators on the sides make me worry about durability some. I bought the charge 3 because the battery in my UE Boom 2 died after three years. I was disappointed in that battery life and decided to try another brand. I wish I had just bought another UE Boom now. The sound was a lot more balanced. It had plenty of bass despite a much smaller form factor than the charge 3.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Linking it to my Flip 4 is a mess or any device
customer_reviews.text: The 82% of 5 star reviews is highly questionable. Sounds great, Battery life is OK but linking it to my Flip 4 and my Iphone's bluetooth is not easy. It should be must smoother to link the phone and other compatible JBL devices. I even have the JBL App and still it's a multi step process linking everything together. Not cool. EDIT downgrade to 1 star. This speaker is garbage. Difficult to link, pair, download firmware and their App is worse! Stay Away.
customer_reviews.author: Benedetto Franzoso

customer_reviews.title: Impressive sound quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Only giving 4 stars because the treble is not as bright as I would like. With that being said, I am truly impressed with the overall sound quality from this small and rather light weight Bluetooth speaker! The sound quality is definitely fair, and it will fill most any room with surprisingly rich sound. FYI: I am very spoiled when it comes to audio systems and this little guy still makes me giggle from amazement. The few people that have heard the sound can’t believe that it’s just this one unit!!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality, disconnects all the time
customer_reviews.text: I got this "renewed" because it had great reviews online. I was excited to bring it with me while hiking, kayaking, and more. When I got it, it was bigger than I thought it would be and the sound quality was compromised. I didn't use it much during the first 30 days and then when I did, it would always disconnect from my computer or other devices im the m I deleted of a song, interesting the song. It's basically useless and when I complained to the company, they ignored me. I was horrible disappointment and a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Andre Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great so far - really no complaints.
customer_reviews.text: First off, the bass is okay - not great. That goes without saying in a speaker this small. Beyond that, however, this is an excellent device with great battery life (I've used it for 8 hours already over a week and it's still going strong), is obviously very portable, and sounds great. I read the complaints about the speaker being unidirectional and it is true that the sound from the backside isn't as good as that from the front. That is a small complaint, from my perspective. I gave one to my son a year ago and I hope to get them together to see how the two play together.
customer_reviews.author: Big Cid

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good, battery lasts forever, and it feels solidly built. Bass is balanced and hangs in there at high volume without clipping. My only minor complaint is the system noises are too loud and can't be disabled or turned down as far as I can find. I use this for low volume music in my office and that power on/Bluetooth pair noise is pretty jarring.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S.

customer_reviews.title: Finally a High Quality bluetooth speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I primarily use this as a bathroom speaker. For the size and price, it sounds fantastic. Powerful bass and great fidelity. I've not noticed any distortion at higher volumes. On the subject of volume, this thing is loud! Have experienced no connectivity or range issues with our phones. We use this speaker with a Pixel 2 XL and and iPhone 7 Plus and have had zero issues. The construction is solid and I like the fact that it is waterproof. I have no worries about it being in my bathroom, and no worries about taking it outside should I need to. This is the perfect speaker for someone who wants premium HiFi sound out of a modern portable solution.
customer_reviews.author: HighSierras13

customer_reviews.title: Worth it as long as you get an authentic product
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant of buying on here because of all the reviews where people received counterfeit/knockoff JBL Charge 3 speakers. I tried to buy from JBL's website but they were backordered. Took my chance on here and I was relieved to have gotten an authentic item. Thank you to everyone that reviewed and put pictures that show what a knockoff would look like. I've only used it twice but the sound quality is great. There's bass but not so much that it distorts at max volume so thats good. I'm sure a heavy bass song may alter the sound quality but that can be said for most speakers. Overall, I'd say it's a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Neil S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound in a Small Package
customer_reviews.text: I've been impressed with the sound quality of this speaker. I've only had it for a few weeks, so I can't evaluate the long term reliability, but so far, everything has worked flawlessly, especially the Bluetooth connectivity. I don't normally disconnect the ac, so I can't evaluate the battery life on a single charge. Overall, so far, I'm quite pleased with this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: blackdog

customer_reviews.title: Designed with youth in mind
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this speaker because I needed a speaker that would give me reasonable sound quality at a reasonable price. The Charge fills these criteria. However, I did not plan to purchase a speaker that announces to the world with a loud "Badda-Boom!!!" that it is turning on or off, a feature for insecure egos to register their high degree of coolness to their peers. If this feature were optional it would not be so bad. But to have to endure this puerile audio announcement at every use greatly decreases the actual enjoyment I get from the speaker
customer_reviews.author: John Kusala

customer_reviews.title: Amazing speaker that gets loud very fast
customer_reviews.text: The speaker is very easy to carry around, connection takes only a few seconds, and it gets very loud. Playing any bass heavy song can make the room have a satisfying rumble, without it completely overpowering the other ranges. Only gripe is the battery life, but considering anything above 50-60% volume can begin to drain it, the battery isn't all too bad. If it packed a bit more battery (even an hour at 50+%) would easily bring the battery rating to 5/5. Other than the small but forgiving gripe, the speaker is absolutely worth the money it asks for.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, eargasm sounds!
customer_reviews.text: At first sight of the box it came in, I all ready knew the speaker was going to blow me away. And did it really? Absolutely! The sounds are powerful, great balance of treble and bass. Compared to other top brands such as Bose and Beats by Dr. Dre, JBL also delivers rich, clear, and great sounding speakers. I love my Charge 3! It may be a bit clunky, but it's just like the size of a standard sized water bottle. Connects easily once your bluetooth is on, and also easily connects to additional charge 3 speakers for a more surround experience. Still yet have to test battery life though.
customer_reviews.author: Daryll Mae Manlapig

customer_reviews.title: Excellent portable speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, solid bass, durable, easy Bluetooth connectivity. I've had many portable speakers over the years and this is one of my favorites. Took it to the beach and was impressed by its power, battery life and durability. Easy to clean, even with sand. Would absolutely buy again. And can pair with others for party mode easily.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible life span!!
customer_reviews.text: The reason I'm giving this a one star is the life span on it I ended purchasing this item 2 years back unfortunately the item has stopped working will not necessarily working and does not play music anymore I wanted to check the warranty on this product and when I went on the warranty on the Amazon page for it it would not give me the warranty information I definitely think this product is really good I enjoyed it for a year-and-a-half but unfortunately the lifespan on it is horrible I would definitely love for anybody to help me out to try to fix the situation and get my item fixed or replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon

customer_reviews.title: $100 paperweight complete garbage
customer_reviews.text: Randomly turns off on its own despite being fully charged, I have only had it for 2 weeks and barely used it. After researching forums it looks like it's a known issue. Wish it said that in the Amazon, and so I didn't buy a broken product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are the best
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY!! I've returned two other sets of speakers. Great ratings here, but no brand I'd heard of before. They went back. Poor sound, poor connectivity - despite rave reviews saying both factors were near perfect. Yeah well I'm not one of those and these ones are - near perfect. They sound GREAT, are loud, deep bass, connect to BOTH an outside source and each other (I bought two). Buy a brand that's stood the test of time JBL has been and will be a real player in this game, pun obviously intended...
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working Fake Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I had this speaker for 1 day, and it worked fine, it was charged fully. By the end of the day, it stopped working, during the time of playing music on my phone, this speaker kept shutting off, then I could not get it to turn back on. I charged it for one day, and the speaker still would not turn on. Super Bummed out. I started a return on the item, and will get a full refund. Now they won't take back the item. Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.author: Michelle MacGaffey Alvis

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new speaker for our by the pool. I'm amazed at how good this is. The sound quality is great and it's waterproof. I went by someone eleses recommendation and made sure once it was in my cart that it was from an authorized reseller. Acuostic Sound Design is where mine came from. It's the real deal. Loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Gibson

customer_reviews.title: ... WOW  My !!! My Second Purchase !
customer_reviews.text: Good product.... This is my second purchase of the JBL Charge 3 (BLUE) !!! My brother liked it so much I gave him my previous Charge 3 (BLACK).The sounds and the Bass just what i was shopping for, does not let up on performance. I use the settings on Android to set Bass treble and in between. For my use In my small home is perfect. YouTube puts out music that is sometimes copied over and do not give good sounds, but when you hear it in YouTube digital really brings out the great sounds. These are my own personal views.
customer_reviews.author: dan b.

customer_reviews.title: 2nd JBL - Major Charger Issues - FIRE
customer_reviews.text: My first JBL actually started on fire! I'm so lucky I was standing there. It was plugged in and charging and it suddenly started flaming. It melted right where it was plugged in. I loved the sound quality and size so much so I took a chance and ordered a new one. After a full summer of use the place where you insert your charging cord is all warped. Can't plug the charger in so it's completely shot. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: MichelleB

customer_reviews.title: Reviews were Right!
customer_reviews.text: Was worried the JBL Charge 3 would have too much bass, but it doesn't. The sound it good enough for me, and I'm picky. I love it. It pairs automatically with anything it's previously been paired to, if that device already has its Bluetooth on. The customer reviews said I'd like it, that it was one of the best options out there. I decided to trust them and ordered one for myself. The reviews were right! It's a great little speaker. Out of doors there's volume to spare. I think I'm going to recommend the JBL Charge 3 to all my friends. I'm so happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like the great sound and how easy it was to pair the speakers with whatever device I had with me. The battery life is long. I've only needed to charge it once in the month I've had it. I was late to the game of bluetooth speakers. They are so much easier than using our stereo system. I like the orange charging cord, easy to find. It is designed to be waterproof with a seal over the ports. I suppose it would survive being dunked in the pool accidentally.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mix

customer_reviews.title: Great by the pool
customer_reviews.text: We use it all summer to listen to music by the pool. It has great sound for a small unit. And no worries of the water hitting it. My daughter has even brought it in the pool with us. The sound is not too good in the water but the speaker does float. My daughter even uses it in the shower. We have owned it for about 2 years now and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: chadehunt

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase EVER! From 2017. So awesome we felt the need to give a review
customer_reviews.text: We have literally enjoyed this speaker more than ANY OTHER! We purchased it in 2017 and it's been in beach sand, very damp, literally through the ringer! Still AMAZING! Battery life still fantastic. We truly can't say enough about this speaker. We purchased a lot, including Beats and there's no comparison. Worth every dollar!!
customer_reviews.author: AudioBobby

customer_reviews.title: My clip is better than this speaker
customer_reviews.text: I'm missing an power outlet and a aux cord. When I turn the volume all the way up you can't hear the bass anymore and it starts to static. My clip is better than this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: A true workhorse
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these to replace a speaker that just wasn't loud enough for gatherings. I gave it its test run on a boat outing yesterday with 15 friends. The sound was perfect. It was loud enough, and it was very clear. Suddenly, someone asked if it was waterproof. I said I thought it was. Just then, we hit a wave and the speaker went into the lake. Everyone freaked out because they thought it was gone forever. Someone reached down and hauled it back onto the boat. The music was still blaring, and it was still in out-of-the-box condition. This is now my favorite bluetooth speak. In fact, I'm ordering another one.
customer_reviews.author: Cuse Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Great quality portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this speaker. Sound quality is good. The bass is great for a small portable speaker, but make no mistake, it does not have the same bass quality as a 12" subwoofer. It's not going to thump an entire room. But i'm satisfied. Battery life is good, i've gone a week or more of intermittent use without charging it. Not sure how many hours that translates to. Probably my only complaint is that the sound it makes when it connects or disconnects is at a fixed volume and is a bit too loud for my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: was expecting it to have more bass... was quite a bit disappointed with that... Especially for the weight!!! But that aside its still good listening and for many older ears I am sure thats perfect... If it had a little more bass on the low end like the low bass you hear when turning it on, I would have given it a 4 star... and if the bass was stronger and richer it most certainly would have gotten a 5... so I think 3*** is about right...
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Good sound. Good battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Mids and highs sound nice. Good clarity. Bass is well pronounced at medium volume levels. Personally, I like my sound more balanced (we listen to music that doesn't have a lot of boomy bass) It can go pretty loud indoors (haven't tried it outside yet). So far so good. On a side note, I like the bass on the JBL Charge 3 more than the JBL Charge 4.
customer_reviews.author: HungryYoshi

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality, but blown speaker after 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: The speaker has good sound quality for the price, but it lasted for all of two months and now the speaker is blown. It was used pretty lightly too, and the volume was never at 100%. Really disappointing given JBL's reputation when it comes to audio equipment. Ended up ordering an Ultimate Ears Megaboom on sale for only a few more bucks than I got this for-- that's what I recommend you do as well until JBL releases something much more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Araiza

customer_reviews.title: Charge 3 is awesome !
customer_reviews.text: I Bought for my girlfriend four years ago for her birthday. Wow this lil thing is awesome ! Sound is amazing and shes taken it all over the world travelling. It is water proof and it can also charge your phone. Four years later it is still one of the best on the market. I am going to finally buy another for myself. I was looking into the newer Charge 4, but found out it is a mono speaker design ( one front facing speaker ). So I am buying another Charge 3 instead as it's a stereo unit. With two front facing speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality speaker, sounds dope
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker, sounds really good. I’m going to buy more to have a better sound as a group of speakers with me. U can add it to ur movie or just music everywhere in the house. My plan is to have one in every corner in my house. I have 2 story house and I wanna have one in every corner in the house including my restrooms so when I play music I would be able to have the sound everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound quality of this thing. I was expecting a bit more power since it’s bigger than other JBLs but still is powerful enough to my use. Battery life is outstanding, I haven’t charge it for three days literally. Although I’ve use it for like two hours each day. Bluetooth connection is good. I haven’t been able to switch devices easily. The JBL connects fast with iPhone but the iPad Mini 4 takes too much time to read it. Overall, very satisfied. 8.5/10
customer_reviews.author: Esteban Núñez

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth speaker that I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Although I’ve never spent this much money on one it was well worth it. It gets pretty loud. Not extremely, but plenty for poolside. It sounds awesome as if it’s a much larger. Bass is good. I actually take it in the shower sometimes but out of line of the direct stream obviously. My only complaint is that you cannot change the song from the speaker itself, only from the source. Wish it had a remote
customer_reviews.author: michelle s

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again if I ever had to
customer_reviews.text: Best bluetooth speaker I’ve had. Only dislike I have is that if you’ve previously been connected to it and someone else connects then you have to turn your Bluetooth off. Other than that it’s awesome. Great sound and long battery life. I take it kayaking with me and it does a good job repelling water.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton Howton

customer_reviews.title: Nice player
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as someone wrote that the #4 had only one speaker. Since I have read that #4 is actually crisper in sound. I do notice a little muffle in sound on this unit and wish I had bought #4.
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Prime

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding durable speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I love JBL, and this is an excellent speaker! It's everything they advertise: great sound, great features, nice looking, compact, durable, and my son's already tested the waterproofing successfully. The sound isn't quite as amazing as Bose, but it's not nearly that expensive either. It's top-notch for the price though. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is I recently found an unbranded version of the same speaker for 10% of the price, but it doesn't have a warranty either. Overall, I'm happy with the purchase. Get the LGTEM case to go with it, and you'll be very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Simantic

customer_reviews.title: Loved the sound but it didnt work for me consistantly
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to be the speaker that I kept for the long haul but sadly I am returning it today. The sound is impressive with nice low bass for something so small. However, I am only able to connect through Bluetooth on my phone. I was able to connect to 2 separate laptops, a PC and Mac and although it shows connected there is no sound coming out of the speaker. I checked my sound settings on both laptops. I also tried plugging in the 3.5mm audio cable into both laptops and my phone and I could not get sound to come out.
customer_reviews.author: Love4food

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expect but great sound!
customer_reviews.text: It's only about 9" wide (didn't read the specs before purchase) but must say sounds great! Not only that but the sound doesn't just come out the front, but out the back as well. We use this to play backing tracks and then play along on our banjo and guitar. We love that we can set it out in front of us and play for an audience and they hear it as well as us. And having it bluetooth means no extra cables to get in our way. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Fennell

customer_reviews.title: So far a good speaker, I was in doubt of buying it ...
customer_reviews.text: So far a good speaker, I was in doubt of buying it due to the bad reviews but I still bought it and it turned out to be a fantastic speaker! I bought the Cambridge soundworks Oontz angle 3 plus a couple months earlier but I wanted more power so I went and bought the charge 3 and I must say it is a well balanced speaker i love the clarity and bass of this speaker so if you feel for something a little less expensive I'd say go for the Cambridge Oontz 3 plus still a very good selection. PS. I love the sound it makes when turning on/off.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: My favorite speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is my second JBL Charge 3. If I hadn’t left the the first one on my bumper and backed over it after it fell of while backing up, it would still be running strong today. Had the first one for over two years and it operated just like new. These will not withstand the weight of an SUV. However, I did drop my speaker more often than I should have so durability is not an issue, minus the SUV mishap. Sound quality is as good as Bose and UE and anything else I’ve heard in comparison of size and price.
customer_reviews.author: angelsbt

customer_reviews.title: Great buy,Great sound, Stays charged
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my son for Christmas. He was actually wanting the JBL Charge 4 but after reading so many of the reviews of upset people that said that it is mono. You don’t get sound of music out of both speakers I am glad I went with this one. He says you can hear it through the whole warehouse he works at. It is a huge warehouse. He also said the battery last forever. He only takes it home once or twice a week to charge it. I purchased the JBL charge 4 case because I couldn’t find a case for the 3. He said it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ShellieT

customer_reviews.title: 2nd speaker is refurbished, and makes popping noises.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these, each at a different time, and the first one I got works perfectly and is clearly brand new. No issues with that one. But the second speaker is definitely refurbished. The lights are dull and it looks like it was crushed really bad. It still works and sounds great but I'm upset nonetheless. I would recommend this if you're a generally lucky person. Update: after 30 minutes the speaker keeps cutting out. It's basically unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Saul Flores

customer_reviews.title: The bass is great, but the high notes and treble are not ...
customer_reviews.text: The bass is great, but the high notes and treble are not as clear as I’d like. Also, the battery life isn’t as long as expected. I don’t use it at real high volume, but I only get 8 to 10 hours of use between charges. Although it’s the first cordless speaker I’ve owned, I think it could be clearer. It doesn’t make any difference whether you use the cable or Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Eric E Hinsvark

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: The port for the charger is located behind a flap which puts pressure on the USB mini cord input and ultimately causes the port to break and not maintain a charge. The sounds quality is fabulous, but the design flaw with the charge port impacts the life of the product. Would not recommend. Other 1 star reviews mention that attempting repair using the warranty was unsuccessful. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality and outdoor use were my main criteria in selecting a portable speaker. This one has very good sound quality, not tinny, but with rich bass and no distortion at my sound levels. I leave it out on the deck with not much protection from the weather without problem. I charge it every few days after using for a cpl hours per day- battery life is good.
customer_reviews.author: Pollen

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to UE Megaboom at a lower price point
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect to fill up a 20x20 room with concert hall sound at this price point - That doesn't exist. But if you want a portable that has decent sound, uber portable, syncs seamlessly to Bluetooth every time, is waterproof and can charge your phone while playing for hours, this is it. Good quality materials and watching the little speaker cones thump away is amusing. I think it has richer bass than our UE Megaboom. It is also a little more 'directional' than the Mega (for better or worse.) I'm happy with it. Long battery life and can get dunked in the pool. Amazing what a hundred bucks will buy you these days.
customer_reviews.author: No Bologna

customer_reviews.title: Great to use for hands free phone calls
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as an upgrade for five year old Beats Pill, huge improvement! Microphone feature for hands free calls works great. Sound quality is 8/10, controls are 8/10, would be nice if it had fast f & rewind buttons too, everything else is well thought out. The call quality is excellent, for someone who doesn't like holding phone to their head this is for you. cranks tunes well also.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Pomerantz

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an outdoor party and ended up buying another. The individual sound is impressive, but when linked together, the sound is comparable to systems 10x the cost. We use the for surround in the entertainment room, as well as filling the back yard with tunes whIle working outside. Highly recommended and a friendly price.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker with big sound.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little compact speaker. It had a lot of sound for its size. It is now the only speaker I need to use while pool side. It is waterproof and has taken a few dunks in the pool. It has also withstood being dropped in the sand and on concrete. Volume can be adjusted by using your phone or the speaker buttons. You can also charge your phone or any rechargeable device by connecting to the speaker ports. So no dead devices while out and about. I'm uncertain of the distance of the Bluetooth connection but I've walked around my large yard without disconnect issues. The speaker will also fit end to end in most cup holders.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great bluetooth speaker! Lots of bass!
customer_reviews.text: Our Jawbone Jambox finally died after many years of faithful service, so we looked for a replacement. I had heard this JBL before and was very impressed with the full, rich sound. Now that this model has been replaced, the price has been cut which even makes it a better purchase. From the moment we took the speaker out of the box and plugged it in, it WOWED! The Bluetooth connects quickly and the sound is great! Also, the battery lasts for a loooooong time!
customer_reviews.author: Palm tree

customer_reviews.title: Short life, painful death
customer_reviews.text: I've owned my Charge 3 speaker for a year. It worked great for six months and then the audio began to sound horrible. The speaker had a rattling sound. No damage was done to the speaker. During its last month, the speaker would no longer connect via bluetooth. It had a great, but brief life. Now, it's buried peacefully in the local landfill.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley C.

customer_reviews.title: Get this one
customer_reviews.text: They make one a size larger than this but the sound quality is actually much better with this one. I travel a lot and no matter where I am this is all the stereo I need. Incredible sound, incredible quality. For the money you won’t do better.
customer_reviews.author: John Stevens

product_meta.title: JBL Charge 3 Waterproof Portable Bluetooth Speaker (Blue) (JBLCHARGE3BLUEAM)
product_meta.description: Color:BlueBluetooth audio where you want it:jbl charge 3 is the ultimate, high-powered portable Bluetooth speaker with powerful stereo sound and a power bank All in one package. The charge 3 takes the party everywhere, poolside or in the rain, thanks to the waterproof design, Durable fabric and rugged housing. Its high-capacity 6, 000mAh battery provides 20 hours of playtime and can charge your smartphones and tablets via its USB output. A built-in noise and echo-cancelling speakerphone gives you crystal clear calls with the press of a button. Wirelessly link multiple JBL connect-enabled speakers to amplify the listening experience.wireless Bluetooth streaming: wirelessly connect up to 3 smartphones or tablets to the speaker and take turns playing powerful stereo sound. 6000mAh power bank: built-in rechargeable li-ion battery supports up to 20 hours of playtime and charges smartphones and tablets via USB. Speakerphone: take crystal clear calls from your speaker with the touch of a button thanks to the noise and echo-cancelling speakerphone. IPX7 waterproof: No more worrying about rain or spills; you can even submerge charge 3 in water. JBL connect: build your own ecosystem by connecting multiple JBL connect enabled speakers together to amplify the listening experience. Lifestyle materials: The durable fabric Material and rugged rubber housing allows your speaker to outlast all of your adventures. JBL bass radiator: hear the bass, feel the bass, see the bass. Dual external passive radiators demonstrate just how powerful your speakers are.
